question: Flowers - Are Lillies permitted in and out doors.
answer:
QUESTION
Are lillies okay to grow in ones garden. Also, are artificial lillies permitted in homes made out of wax (candle)and other forms. I ask this question owing to many views are given from family and friends.
ANSWER


Share:
It is permissible to grow fless lilies in one's garden. It is also permissible to keep artificial lilies in one's home. and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best Mufti Ebrahim Desai
